大変だったけど
google_translated:
I was fun
It was difficult though

jp_text: フッ ごめん

en_text: I'm convinced that the place you remember must still exist somewhere.
jp_text:
きっと まだどこかにあるよ
思い出の場所
google_translated:
I'm sure I'm still somewhere
a place of memories

en_text: Okay, I hope we can meet again.
jp_text: じゃあ また会えるといいね
google_translated: Well then I hope I can see you again

jp_text: （タケル）もう迷うなよ！
うん さようなら
（ヤサコ）知らない

電話あったわよ
（ヤサコ）誰から？

en_text: Your teacher at the Kanazawa school, Mr. Ishida.
jp_text: （静江）金沢で担任だった石田(いしだ)先生
google_translated: Ishida who was a homeroom teacher in Kanazawa

jp_text: それで なんだって？

en_text: You had a friend called Mayumi, right?
jp_text: マユミちゃんって友達いたでしょ

en_text: She's going to move to Hokkaido.
jp_text:
あの子ね
もうすぐ北海道に引っ越すんだって
google_translated:
That girl
I'm going to move to Hokkaido soon

en_text: He phoned because you and she were good friends.
jp_text:
（静江）優子と仲良かったからって
わざわざ連絡くだすったのよ
google_translated:
because I was good friends with Yuko
She won't contact us

jp_text: これ マユミちゃんの連絡先だって
google_translated: This is the contact address of Miyumi

en_text: He sure was a mysterious boy...
jp_text: （ヤサコ）不思議な男の子だったな

en_text: But thanks to him, I remembered something.
jp_text:
でも おかげで
ちょっとだけ思い出せたわ
google_translated:
But thanks
I just remembered a little

jp_text: あのイリーガル…

en_text: May this is just a record I made of some dream I had?
jp_text:
（ヤサコ）
これも夢の記憶を描いたのかな？
google_translated: Is this also a dream memory?

jp_text: それとも…
あの空間にはなかった
google_translated: It was not in that space

jp_text:
（ヤサコ）
次回 「電脳コイル」
〝イサコの病室 〞
